pr_title: Fix for 839: Do not use locale fallback when getting source locale messages and collectedSourceMsg in TranlationMessage.getMessage

timeline.message: Fixing bug 839: Do not use locale fallback when getting source locale messages and collectedSourceMsg in TranlationMessage.getMessage
Removing unnecessary logic for "latest" and pseudo

timeline.bodyText: Could you explain what problem do these lines resolve before you remove them?
timeline.author: huihuiw01

replies.bodyText:
Nothing, really. Here, it says that if locale is latest", force it to use pseudo=true, which means the result will have #@ around it. This does not even makes sense because if you look at lines 84-87 below, it was stripping all the #@ from the response anyway, forcing the messages to ALWAYS look like pseudo=false if locale is "latest".
We do not need to force pseudo=false for "latest". Removing this allows the product team to apply the same pseudo configuration, whether it is true or false, to all locale bundles including "latest".
replies.author: jessiejuachon

timeline.bodyText: Could you explain what problem do these lines resolve before you remove them?
